mapper.select: select d.user_id as userId, a.product_id as productId, e.form_name as formName, a.product_model as productModel, a.product_name as productName, a.product_date as productDate, b.contract_id as contractId, b.contract_year as contractYear, b.contract_price as contractPrice, c.file_path as imageFile, c.file_type as imageType from product a join contract b on a.product_id = b.product_id left join form e on a.form_id = e.form_id left join product_file c on b.product_id = c.product_id left join basket d on d.contract_id = b.contract_id where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basket (user_id, contract_id, product_id, product_pcs) VALUES (#{userId}, #{contractId}, #{productId}, 1)
